name: Tradition
uniques: Greatly increases the rate of border expansion of cities by 25%.

policies.name: Productive Environment
policyEffects: +1 Happiness for every 10 Citizens in a City.

policies.name: Garrisoned City
policyEffects: Garrisoned units cost no maintenance and cities with a garrison gain 50% Ranged Combat Strength.

policies.name: Legal System
policyEffects: Provides a free culture building in your first 4 cities.
Provides a Courtroom after Guilds was discovered.

policies.name: Under One Man
policyEffects: +1 Gold and -1 Unhappiness Unhappiness for every 2 Citizens in the Capital.

policies.name: Agriculture Landlords
uniques: +10% Growth and +2 Food in the Capital.

policies.name: Tradition Completion
uniques: A free Aqueduct in your first four cities.
It also allows the purchase of Great Engineers with Faith starting in the Industrial Era.

policies.name: Wonders of Engineering
policyEffects: +5% Production in cities when constructing Historical Wonders.

policies.name: Citizenship
policyEffects: Tile improvement construction rate increased by 25% and a Worker appears near the Capital.

policies.name: Educated Ones
policyEffects: +1 Happiness for each City you own connected to the Capital and -5% Unhappiness Unhappiness from Citizens in non-occupied Cities.

policies.name: Under Multiple Men
policyEffects: Each city you found will increase the Culture cost of policies by 33% less than normal.

policies.name: Collective Ruling
uniques: Speeds the training of Settlers by 50% in the Capital.
Recieve a free Settler appears near the Capital.

policies.name: Liberty Completion
uniques: A free Great People of choice
